Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Good without noice
Review: Its pleasant and we have very less or no noise from vehicles.Parking space is present.Entry fee is there and monthly pass as well

Name: Jitendra K
Title: Natural place
Review: We went in evening time, I think before dark it is good place to go. We can sit on the benches available.

Name: MathewsDcruz2017
Title: D.G.S Melkote Park
Review: Nice park just visited this park can see that people and kids are been enjoying the garden nice area we can see that nice place for photography but photography is not allowed

Name: gourishanker h
Title: Decent location for family
Review: A good place and park to visit with kids, well maintained by guards. opens in evening by 3pm with Rs5 entry ticketsThere is walking track, thanks HMDAlittle parking available for cars Location easily reached using google maps Combine this trip with weekly grocery from Spencer’s hyper which is 8mins drive. Thumbs up for now.

Name: mhussain_bohra
Title: Great times
Review: One of the best place to spend time with family. It has a nice walking path where one can either walk or jog and there are also small rides for children. Overall a great place.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: Best park to relax
Review: v didn't plan 2 come here  v came 4 movie so its late that to 20 mins so nearby park is there  v eated and v gone 2 that place that to 1st v entered inside at  3pm its open i think best 2 go  at rainy season or evening  many birds and koyals were cmng whitling ,singing atmosphere in nice many r cmg 2 relax i think in that area nothing else park is there childrens play area is nice and small canteen ,toiilets, cool water at summer its very nice facilities overthere

Name: Dharanidhar13
Title: Awesome
Review: It was really awesome...we can have great piece of mind.. Good for joggers..for family.. And friends. The maintenance was also good.. We can get foodies there.. The entry was 5rs only..!! A good spot for piece.

Name: Shashank1961
Title: Good for Morning/Evening Walk
Review: Entry fee is Rs.5. Monthly pass also available. Entry Free for Senior Citizens. Paid parking for cars & two wheelers also available. Very well maintained. Spread over 7 acres. Children play area OK. Security good as cameras are installed all over park.Skating area small but good. Closed from 11.30 AM to 3.30 PM. Open all days of the year. Separate path for joggers/walkers. A place to relax.
